84#define AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_CRM_MUX_MSK (0x000000FF)
85#define AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS (8)

110typedef enum
111{
113 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_HFRC_48MHz = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_DISABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0MCLKCRM_I2S0MCLKCLKSEL_HFRC48,
114
116 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_XTHS = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_DISABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0MCLKCRM_I2S0MCLKCLKSEL_RF_XTAL_48MHz,
117
119 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_PLL_POSTDIV = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_DISABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0MCLKCRM_I2S0MCLKCLKSEL_PLLPOSTDIV,
120
122 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_PLL_FOUT3 = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_DISABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0MCLKCRM_I2S0MCLKCLKSEL_PLLFOUT3,
123
125 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_PLL_FOUT4 = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_DISABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0MCLKCRM_I2S0MCLKCLKSEL_PLLFOUT4,
126
128 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_EXTREF = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_DISABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0MCLKCRM_I2S0MCLKCLKSEL_EXTREF_CLK,
129
131 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_NCO_HFRC_96MHz = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_ENABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0REFCLKCRM_I2S0REFCLKCLKSEL_HFRC_96MHz,
132
134 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_NCO_XTHS = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_ENABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0REFCLKCRM_I2S0REFCLKCLKSEL_RF_XTAL_48MHz,
135
137 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_NCO_PLL_POSTDIV = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_ENABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0REFCLKCRM_I2S0REFCLKCLKSEL_PLLPOSTDIV,
138
140 AM_HAL_I2S_CLKSEL_NCO_EXTREF = (AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_ENABLE << AM_HAL_I2S_CLK_NCO_MUX_POS) | CRM_I2S0REFCLKCRM_I2S0REFCLKCLKSEL_EXTREF_CLK,
141
